text: Quick question - is the library referenced by  `const util = require('util');` include by default in the Serverless environment? Or would one have to include that via Webpack?

Update: I found <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-event-registration/blob/master/src/event.functions/eventSignup.js>

This seems to show how to receive data using Request within the servless function
